ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I swear both by what you see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, I call to witness what you see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But no; I swear by what you see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I do not need to swear by what you see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So by oath of the things you see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, I swear by whatsoever you see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But nay! I swear by that which you see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No! I swear by that you see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But nay! I swear by all that ye see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But nay, I swear by all that you can see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: I swear by that which ye see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I swear by what you see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So I do call to witness what ye see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So I swear by whatsoever you see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I swear by all that you can see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Indeed, I swear by what you see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So I swear by what you see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:38] So indeed (fa-lā: lā is extra) I swear by all that you see, of creatures,
